all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Hear, O ye heavens, and give ear, O earth, and rejoice ye inhabitants thereof, for the Lord is God, and beside him there is no Savior.
Doctrine and Covenants 76:1
Quote of the Day
"When we cry out in grief or joy, Jesus Christ understands perfectly."
Elder Gerrit W. Gong | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
